children.value: . If there a replacement or commited image, run that instead.
If you are running it on a network, first create the network
docker run --name sql-test -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -p 6000:3306 --net dev-env -d mysql/mysql-server:latest
Updating the local Docker MySQL instance
Log into the container and first log into
. This will prompt you for that password we created, so now type that in and enter the command line terminal. First, run
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'admin'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION;
